verbose_text: The investigators suggested that BMSCs render MM cells IL-6 / STAT3 independent, and it has been further suggested that combined disruption of IL-6 / STAT3 and ERK1/2 signaling is required to inhibit MM cells in the presence of BMSCs XREF_BIBR.
evidence: IL-6/STAT3 and ERK1/2 signaling is required to inhibit MM
